title: CO County CVR Request (2022, 2024) (Fremont County Clerk & Recorder's Office)

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: CO County CVR Request (2022, 2024) (Fremont County Clerk & Recorder's Office)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Cast vote record (CVR) data for the following elections:
1. 2022 Nov Midterm Election
2. 2024 Nov General Election

Specifically, I’m looking for the full anonymized record of votes cast each election generated by the voting system.

In case it is helpful for your reference, you can find an example of these records in REDACTED format at this link on the Arapahoe County webpage: https://www.arapahoevotes.gov/transparency
If you follow the "Redacted Cast Vote Record (CVR)" link on that webpage, it will download a csv file with Arapahoe County's redacted CVR records (this: https://gis.arapahoegov.com/dl_data/cr_voter_data/redacted_cvr/REDACTED_CVR_Export_20241126111830_330948.zip.)

I am requesting these records NOT redacted pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act. Please let me know if you need any further clarification on the type of data that I am requesting.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aleksandra Conevska

title: Responses to NSF's DCL about NCAR

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Responses to NSF's DCL about NCAR
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All of the responses to NSF DCL Publication NSF 26-203,
  "NSF Intent to Restructure Critical Weather Infrastructure"
  received by the closing date of March 13, 2026.
  These responses may have been submitted through the DCL web page
  (https://www.nsf.gov/funding/information/dcl-nsf-intent-restructure-critical-weather-infrastructure)
  or through other channels.

- All metadata associated with those responses, including the name(s) of agents
  who reviewed them, any judgements which were made about them,
  and any policies or instructions concerning the handling of the responses.

This request is being made for the purpose of scholarly and scientific research,
not for commercial purposes.  The requested documents will be made available to the general public,

I prefer the request to be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me 
of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. 

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. 
I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Raeder
